OOC I'm back, miss me?

I leave for a short time and the world falls apart,=
 guess I'll have to bring some superglue.

BIC

Bullet exits his quarters f=
ully recharged and ready to do his duty. Even if his duty was to play nurse=
maid to a lizard. Being sentenced to protect Chameleon was a fate worse tha=
n death. The bull would've rather have faced a fireing squad than bear such=
 indignity.

Alarms sounded (Logically they'd go off since a virus had been=
 released.) chiming the release of a dangerous material into the ships atmo=
sphere. Bullet checked the computer for Chameleons location. "Why am I not =
surprised?" he thought when he found that the bot he was to protect was rig=
ht in the middle of the action. He transformed to bull and rushed through t=
he halls toward the disturbance hoping the doors to that level hadn't block=
ed it off to protect the rest of the ship.


  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday=
, May 11, 2001 10:03 AM
  Subject: BlackFortres... 


  Chamaleon/ScorPyo/T=
hyphon/Elecktra:

  Scorpyo continue whinning that he liked to help Chaemlo=
n., and he shouted "Scorpyo LIKES" and shot against a container that have a=
 dangerous virus in gas.

  CHamaleon ran out side the lab and closed the d=
oor, leaving Scorpyo inside.  CHamelon looked horrified that gas was leavin=
g the lab and and the airtight doors started to close, in area 2. Chameleon=
 left area 2  before doors closed  but he fell in stasis lock due the virus=
.

  Thyphon and ELectra left mes hall and went towards the high risk labs =
where Chameleon was.

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! =
Terms of Service.
